text: Last night, Serena Williams returned to the red carpet for the first time after welcoming her first child, Alexis Olympia Ohanian Jr. on September 1. The tennis champ made an appearance at Glamour's Women of the Year Awards in Brooklyn, New York, wearing a mini dress from Versace's Spring 2018 collection. Getty Images She looked absolutely amazing. Getty Images'' It's been a while since I've been on the red carpet,'' Williams revealed on her Instagram Story. She recalled that her last appearance was at the Met Gala, where she debuted her baby bump, while attending with her fianc√©, Reddit co - founder Alexis Ohanian.
